summary: This is a brief email chain from July 15, 2019, forwarding a transcript related to Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates the transcript was sent on the same day and was considered helpful by the recipient.

events.title: Epstein Transcript Forwarded
events.description: A transcript related to Jeffrey Epstein was forwarded via email on July 15, 2019, with the sender noting it might be helpful.

keyFacts: An email chain dated July 15, 2019, discusses a transcript related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The transcript was forwarded with the note 'in case it's helpful for y'all'.
The recipient replied, 'This is very helpful, thank you!'
The document is identified as EFTA00080515 and references a file named <J7FYEPSB.pdf>.
